mapper.select: select month(guest_date) as 'monthly_date' ,count(guest_no) guest_count from guest group by monthly_date order by monthly_date desc ;

select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(`guest_date`, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(`guest_date`)-1) DAY), '%Y/%m/%d') as weekly_start ,DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(`guest_date`, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(`guest_date`)-7) DAY), '%Y/%m/%d') as weekly_end ,DATE_FORMAT(`guest_date`, '%Y%U') as 'date' ,count(guest_no) guest_count from guest group by date order by date desc ;
select date(guest_date) as 'daily_date' ,count(guest_no) guest_count from guest group by daily_date order by daily_date desc ;
